statements: SELECT * FROM SalesData;
SELECT SaleID, ProductName, SaleAmount FROM SalesData WHERE CustomerName = 'John Doe';
SELECT CustomerName, SaleDate FROM SalesData ORDER BY SaleDate DESC;
SELECT ProductName, SaleAmount FROM SalesData WHERE SaleAmount > 1000;
SELECT SaleID, SaleAmount FROM SalesData WHERE ProductName LIKE '%shirt%';
SELECT ProductName, SaleAmount, SaleDate FROM SalesData WHERE SaleAmount > 1000 ORDER BY SaleDate DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM SalesData WHERE CustomerName = 'Alice' ORDER BY SaleAmount ASC
SELECT SaleID, ProductName, SaleAmount FROM SalesData WHERE SaleDate BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY SaleAmount DESC
SELECT CustomerName, SaleAmount FROM SalesData WHERE ProductName LIKE 'Shirt%' OR ProductName LIKE '%Trousers%'
SELECT SaleID, CustomerName, SaleDate FROM SalesData WHERE CustomerName <> 'Bob' AND SaleAmount > 500 ORDER BY SaleID ASC
SELECT * FROM sales_data;
SELECT product_name, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM sales_trends ORDER BY trend_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sale_amount ASC;
SELECT MAX(sale_amount) AS max_sale_amount FROM sales_data;
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT product_name, sale_date FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount < 500 AND product_name LIKE '%Shoes%';
SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM sales_trends ORDER BY trend_start_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM sales_data JOIN sales_trends ON sales_data.sale_id = sales_trends.trend_id;
SELECT * FROM sales_data
SELECT customer_id, order_amount FROM sales_data ORDER BY order_amount DESC
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products WHERE product_price > 50
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_date FROM sales_data WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT * FROM sales_data ORDER BY order_date DESC, order_amount ASC
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_phone LIKE '%555%'
SELECT product_name, product_category, product_price FROM products WHERE product_price > 100 ORDER BY product_price DESC
SELECT order_id, customer_id, product_id, order_amount FROM sales_data WHERE customer_id = 12345 AND order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT customer_name, order_date, order_amount FROM customers JOIN sales_data ON customers.customer_id = sales_data.customer_id WHERE customers.customer_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY order_date
SELECT product_name, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 1000;
SELECT product_name, category, unit_price FROM products WHERE unit_price < 50 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, sale_amount FROM sales_data
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT product_name, unit_price, category FROM products ORDER BY unit_price DESC
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT * FROM sales_orders INNER JOIN products ON sales_orders.product_id = products.product_id
SELECT * FROM sales_data;
SELECT sale_id, product_name, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT order_id, order_date, customer_name, product_name FROM orders JOIN customers ON orders.customer_id = customers.customer_id JOIN products ON orders.product_id = products.product_id;
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE '%Doe%';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_name, product_category, price FROM products WHERE price >= 50;
SELECT SUM(sale_amount) AS total_sales FROM sales_data;
